Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/95th
ShortDescription: NB 28 Stony Island buses are rerouted via 103rd, Yates, 100th, Van Vissingen, Jeffery, 93rd and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Yates, 100th, Van Vissingen, Jeffery, 93rd and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/95th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Stony Island/95th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 93rd, Kenwood, 94th and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 93rd, Kenwood, 94th and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/95th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Trains bypassing Western Station
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
